title: RFKOS RPG FULL_CLIENT
description:
RF Kill On Sight RPG

-is a mmorpg game originally made by CCR, this concept is a low rate semi hardcore style the concept have similarities to official RF Online like RF Philippines or RF USA but we made a unique rpg features to make the game more fun and a little bit easier.

Developed by: Team Cerberus
Server Location: USA LA, EU, TOKYO,MSK.
No Wipe Out.
No Dupe!
No Cheats!
No Wall Hacks and Fly Hacks
No Lag! (it depends on your internet service provider)
6 Server Gates 2 for USA 2 EUROPE 2 ASIA 
Anti DC Features 

We are using The Best RF Online Network & Game Proection.
Long Term System & Plans.
Cheap Cash shop points.
Professional Dev, Game Masters and Administrators.


Best RPG Features

Game Info

Max level: 50/55/65
Exp rate: x3 Normal x5 PS
Drop rate: x2 Normal x3 PS
Mining rate: x1 Normal Outside & Inside (moded speed)
Animus rate: x3 Normal x5 PS
PT & Skill rates: x4 Normal x6 PS
Free Premium Service for 5 days

Game Features:

1. All languages are available.

2. Quest money reward x7 (Total of 40m every quest completion from level 1-40)

New RF Online Update (applied)

3. Mining outside the crag mine

4. Win or Lose can mine
*Winning Race = core (maximum mining speed)
*Lose Race = outside, with mining points (minimal mining speed)

5. Upgrade Rates = Default

6. Cross Class = Default & Fixed

7. RMT allowed but "RULES" will be applied, SCAM = BANNED

8. Open World Wide, you can set what language you want.

9. Crafting is active

10. Defense and favor upgrade fixed

11. PK potion fixed
-player under chaos potion can attack only another player that used chaos potion or players of another race.

12. Gold points in PB

New Features Applied 

13 . All class can use crafting tools (you need to increase your PT crafting to craft higher level items)

14. Auto Loot charm for premium services

15. Wind weapons & Slot extenders buy in NPC GOLD PIG @ HQ using gold points.

16. Ether, VC, Sette PB 
additional drops: 
-gold capsules
-abilities for type c and stones for crafting.

17. all Elan PB 
additional drops: 
-gold capsules 
-ability reavers

8. Elite Reavers crafting is now enabled

Guides:


9. Level of mobs identifier -you can now see the level of monsters
